name: Abree | Beta V1.0
description:
This game is made from scratch and is only in beta. This game is called Abree! Abree is a free game where you go through doors to find the "secret" of Abree. 

Instructions:

-Arrow Keys/WD to move 
-Click doors to interact with them
-Don't choose the wrong doors because there are traps and there is no way back, well sometimes.
-Click play to play
-On your keyboard, press "R" to reset

You can't jump

Link to play it on scratch:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/40296623
